title: T206 Broad Leaf 350 Irv Young PSA 4.5 VG-Ex+
author: wcsportscards

posts.post_title: T206 Broad Leaf 350 Irv Young PSA 4.5 VG-Ex+
posts.post_content:
Offering up this gorgeous and rare T206 Broad Leaf 350 Irv Young PSA 4.5 VG-EX+ card. This is 1 of only 2 of the HIGHEST GRADED examples to ever be graded by PSA.

$3000 net to me, delivered
Thanks
